title: Brown-Steelers, OBJ, and free agency
itunes:title: Brown-Steelers, OBJ, and free agency
description:
Colin makes it clear why nobody should bail on the Pittsburgh Steelers next season, what the Cleveland Browns are expected to do with their offense and Odell Beckham Jr., and more on the NFL free agency period. Guests include Jay Glazer, Nick Wright, John Middlekauff, Montrezl Harrell, and Joel Klatt.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
